messages.content: Hi
To ensure we can connect if disconnected, can you please share your email address?
My email is ahmad2720000@gmail.com
Thank you for sharing your email, Ahmad! Could you please tell me a bit about what kind of sign you're looking for — and any other details you'd like us to know?
I need an illuminated sign for my restaurant by 30th of August

Gotcha! To create an accurate mockup and quote, I just need a few more details. 

What are the desired measurements for the sign?
2 by 4 feet

That's perfect! Thank you for clarifying that. 

Do you have any material preferences for the sign — like metal, acrylic, or something else?
metal

Awesome! So we have a 2 by 4 feet metal sign. 

Where will this sign be installed? On a brick wall, concrete, drywall, or another type of surface?
brick wall

Great! So we have a 2 by 4 feet metal sign that will be installed on a brick wall. 

Is the sign going to be installed indoors or outdoors?
outdoors

Thanks for that! So we have a 2 by 4 feet metal sign that will be installed on a brick wall outdoors. 

In which city and state do you want the sign to be delivered?
tuijana mexico

Thanks for sharing that, Ahmad! So, we have the sign being delivered to Tijuana, Mexico. 

Do you have a price point or a budget in mind for this sign?

That's a solid budget, Ahmad! Just to wrap things up, do you have any existing logo files or design elements you'd like to incorporate into your sign? If so, please upload them so our designers can work with your brand assets.
I've uploaded my logo: Screenshot 2025-05-30 160908.png

Thank you for uploading your logo, Ahmad! 

To summarize what we've gathered: you need a 2 by 4 feet metal sign for your restaurant, which will be installed on a brick wall outdoors in Tijuana, Mexico. Your budget is $10,000, and you need it by the 30th of August. 

Any changes in the requirement?
No

That's great to hear! Our designers will create a mockup based on the details we've gathered. You can expect the mockup very shortly. 

Thank you so much for your time, Ahmad! If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a fantastic day!
